subject: Re: [junit] Re: Can't add labels to entries in github issues
msgSnippet: Done and done. David On Tue, Mar 2, 2010 at 12:13 PM, Loritsch, Berin C.
messageBody:
Done and done.

David

On Tue, Mar 2, 2010 at 12:13 PM, Loritsch, Berin C.
<berin.loritsch@...> wrote:
> Sure.  These two are bugs:
>
>
>
> http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/76
>
> http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/82
>
>
>
>
>
> I'll be sure to add "[bug]" to the title of future bugs.
>
>
>
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
> David Saff
> Sent: Tuesday, March 02, 2010 9:35 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit] Re: Can't add labels to entries in github issues
>
>
>
>
>
> That's really unfortunate. For now, I'll serve as human message
> queue. Can you remind me the labels you wanted to add?
>
> David Saff
>
> On Mon, Mar 1, 2010 at 2:23 PM, Loritsch, Berin C.
> <berin.loritsch@... <mailto:berin.loritsch%40gd-ais.com> > wrote:
>> Apparently, in order to help you at all with the issues I need to be a
>> collaborator.  While I don't understand this design constraint that
>> github has imposed, that is where we are.  I assume that granting
>> someone collaborator status also grants permissions to push code up to
>> the master.  I understand that is something that you'll want to
> protect.
>>
>>
>>
>> Essentially I'd love to mark the issues as bugs, or change the title
> to
>> include "[bug]", but I can't do that based on Github's rules.
>>
>>
>>
>> From: junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com> ] On
> Behalf Of
>> Loritsch, Berin C.
>> Sent: Monday, March 01, 2010 10:08 AM
>> To: junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> Subject: RE: [junit] Re: Can't add labels to entries in github issues
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>
>> Ok. Done:
>>
>>
> http://support.github.com/discussions/issues-issues/174-bug-cannot-edit-
>> issues-i-created
>>
>> Thank you.
>>
>> From: junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com> ] On
>> Behalf Of
>> David Saff
>> Sent: Monday, March 01, 2010 9:44 AM
>> To: junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> Subject: Re: [junit] Re: Can't add labels to entries in github issues
>>
>> Urggh. Sounds like another bug. Would you mind taking it up with
>> github at http://support.github.com/, and post the discussion URL
>> here? Thanks,
>>
>> David Saff
>>
>> On Fri, Feb 26, 2010 at 1:51 PM, Loritsch, Berin C.
>> <berin.loritsch@... <mailto:berin.loritsch%40gd-ais.com>
> <mailto:berin.loritsch%40gd-ais.com>
>> <mailto:berin.loritsch%40gd-ais.com> > wrote:
>>> I've tried a few times to change the title. Unfortunately, every time
>> I
>>> clicked on "edit" I got sent to the main list again.
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>> From: junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com> ] On
>> Behalf Of
>>> David Saff
>>> Sent: Wednesday, February 24, 2010 2:10 PM
>>> To: junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>>> Subject: Re: [junit] Re: Can't add labels to entries in github issues
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>>
>>> Apparently, yes. Didn't realize that. Can you prefix the title with
>>> [bug], then? Thanks,
>>>
>>> David
>>>
>>> On Tue, Feb 23, 2010 at 1:35 PM, Berin <berin.loritsch@...
> <mailto:berin.loritsch%40gd-ais.com>
>> <mailto:berin.loritsch%40gd-ais.com>

>>> <mailto:berin.loritsch%40gd-ais.com> > wrote:
>>>> I don't see any check boxes, and there are no drop downs for me.
>>> That's the problem I'm seeing. Is that only available to
>> collaborators?
>>>>
>>>> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com>
>> <mailto:junit%40yahoogroups.com> , David
>>> Saff <david@...> wrote:
>>>>>
>>>>> So it works for me when I:
>>>>>
>>>>> - Select the checkbox next to an item.
>>>>> - Select the dropdown on the "bug" label.
>>>>> - Select "Apply to selection"
>>>>>
>>>>> Just to confirm, is that the process you're following?
>>>>>
>>>>> David Saff
>>>>>
>>>>> On Tue, Feb 23, 2010 at 8:20 AM, Loritsch, Berin C.
>>>>> <berin.loritsch@...> wrote:
>>>>> > Perhaps there is something wrong with the permissions or
>> something,
